summary: Allows the children of Skyrim to be die. Affects the Breton, Imperial, Nord and Redguard children.
descriptionHtml:
Go to: Drive C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\
For those who don\'t have bought the game on steam, the SkyrimPrefs.ini file is located in Drive C:\\Users\\<USERNAME>\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim

Drop the \'killable_children.esp\' in that folder
Launch the Skyrim Launcher, and click on \'Data Files\'
Tick \'killable_children.esp\' and click \'Ok\'
 Idea from \"Killable Children by Xylozi\"
author: BANEGTS
